Education.degree: Masters of Information Technology and Systems
B.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering

Experience.title: Front End Team Member
description: Troubleshooting checkout issues, ensuring seamless transactions while communicating effectively with diverse customers in a fast-paced environment.

Experience.title: Web Development Project Manager
description: Managing a 5-person remote development team across 4 countries, ensuring smooth cross-functional collaboration with Operations, Product, and Marketing.

Optimizing task tracking by introducing Trello, ensuring clear documentation and structured workflows, reducing unnecessary revisions by 66% and improving overall development efficiency by at least 30%.
Working directly with the founder to transform high-level project concepts into detailed feature breakdowns, function mapping, and milestone-driven development roadmaps, ensuring seamless execution.
Aligning development timelines with business objectives, contributing to the successful private beta launch in Dec 2022 and public beta launch in June 2024.
Involving in startup operations and investor-driven decision-making processes.

Experience.title: Project Management Intern
description: Collaborating with developers on refactoring and testing efforts, mapping dependencies, and improving task clarity, contributing to an efficient transition to private beta.

Leadership & Activities.title: International Student Ambassador Program
description: An ambassador to represent and engage with international students in Hobart, promoting cultural exchange, social inclusion, and volunteering at key City of Hobart events.

Leadership & Activities.title: Organising Team Member
description: Organised and hosted the “Build With AI - Hobart” workshop featuring Google Developer Expert (GDE) on Grounding, Cloud Run, and no-code automation, secured venue support from UTAS and engaged the local developer community through learning and networking.

Led the successful panel discussion, “How to Land a Job in the Tech Industry as a Recent Graduate,” driving a 190% community membership growth and 167% attendance increase, with UTAS venue and food sponsorship, in collaboration with UTAS alumni and the Academic Lead.
Started as an attendee, transitioned to a volunteer role, and subsequently joined the organising team.

Leadership & Activities.title: Show Organiser
description: Organized a fundraising event for the underprivileged indigenous ethnic group(Chepang Community) of Nepal.

Projects.title: roomcha
description: A social media platform designed to simplify finding rental and shared rooms or roommates.
Built with React and Python Django, it features secure JWT authentication, Google Maps API for location input, spam protection via reCAPTCHA, and a responsive UI using React Bootstrap.
Deployed on Google Cloud Run with continuous integration for seamless updates.
Integrated Google Analytics for user insights and behavior optimisation.

Projects.title: Personal Website(sachinkharel.com.np)
description: Built with HTML & Tailwind CSS, hosted on GitHub Pages with a custom domain.

Projects.title: Digital Tassie Charity
description: Developed as part of the unit KIT502 - Web Development, utilising PHP, SQL, HTML, and Bootstrap to create a responsive and user-friendly web application.

Projects.title: Indisches Restaurant Ganesha
description: Frontend website developed with React and its styled components for initiating digital footprint of the restaurant. Hosted on Netlify, domain from GoDaddy.
